text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Idiot! Coronavirus isn’t in the past. And ignoring it don’t make it disappear. Congratulations, Ur Time as Vice President is wasted. U served under Trump. Trump picked u cause u won’t be remembered. U’ve done nothing but support idiotic decisions from a idiotic president.
